name: inventario
description: An efficient Inventory Management System created for BitNBuild 2023

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start --prefix client" "npx nodemon --ignore client/ -e ts,.env,json"
scripts.build: npm install --production && cd client && npm install --production && cd .. && npx tsc && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.build-dev: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd .. && npx tsc && npm run build --prefix client
